contents.text: Welcome to Matterport in San Francisco, where we capture real-world spaces as immersive 3D experiences.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To inquire about pricing and subscription options, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Get a quote for Matterport subscription plans
I need subscription pricing details for digitizing spaces for my veteran nonprofit.
Clarify pricing structure and licensing fees for Matterport subscriptions
Could you explain your subscription prices and what each plan includes?
Inquire about subscription plans and student discounts for using Matterport in my lab research.

contents.text: To schedule a live product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live demonstration of Matterport’s 3D capture system
I’d like to schedule a live demo to see how Matterport captures my old barracks for a museum project.
Schedule a live hands-on demo of Matterport’s 3D capture solution
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your 3D scanning system.
Schedule a live product demonstration to see how Matterport can model experimental setups.

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
If you need help with 3D capture workflows or troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my Matterport 3D capture workflow
I’m having issues with my 3D capture workflow and need technical assistance to troubleshoot my scans.
Troubleshoot mesh stitching failures in my 3D scan workflow
I need help troubleshooting my 3D capture – the app isn’t connecting to the camera.
Troubleshoot issues with my 3D capture workflow – scans of my lab equipment are not aligning correctly.

contents.text: For account management and billing support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to account services.

navigationGoals: Update billing information and payment method on my account
I need to update my billing information on my account and review my latest invoice.
Update my account’s billing info and review recent invoices
I need assistance understanding my latest invoice and making a payment.
Manage my account billing – update payment method and check my current subscription status.
